website_summaries.verdict: Our top pick if you want a semi-style RC truck, or like the luxury branding and styling.
pros: Looks and operates (in basic ways) just like a real flatbed truck
Remotes works up to 98' away from vehicle
Can load other RC vehicles onto its trailer, which also detaches
cons: Instructions can be confusing, but customer service is helpful

customer_reviews.title: I'm impressed
customer_reviews.text: I do love this product. While I had a couple problems interpreting the instructions on operation, the company was very prompt in responding and resolving those issues. It is well designed, feature rich, and seems very durable. Plus, it's fun. And for any kid--like my nearly 4-year-old grandson--who's obsessed with all manner of trucks, this is pretty exciting. Now he'll have a platform to load and carry his prized excavator. I've attached a rather imperfect video that shows some of the main functions.
customer_reviews.author: Satisfied Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great for the money...
customer_reviews.text: First off this model is BIG, and that's wonderful. It may not be an expensive piece but for the cost it performs well and it has a trailer that automatically lowers a ramp, disconnects, and stands on jacks! The steering is a little flaky due to the all or nothing way the wheels turn, but you'll get used to it. It used 2 battery packs and personally would not give this to a kid under 10 years old. Looks good enough to be on display with other RC models.
customer_reviews.author: Thundercrusher

customer_reviews.title: Does what it’s advertised to do!
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I thought I was getting an works great. Love the functionality so realistic
customer_reviews.author: Ethan rowan

customer_reviews.title: Very cool truck for the money
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a 10 year old boys birthday and he really likes it. Trailer can be disconnected/reconnected by remote as well as lowering/raising the tailgate. Includes wheel chocks that lock into various spots on the flat bed to help secure cargo. Comes with 2x batteries, one for the cab and one for the trailer (AA required for the remote). They are the same battery though so you could drive the cab twice as long with no trailer functions if you choose. I would say with younger children it may be slightly difficult to drive given the gooseneck connection between truck and trailer but the fast and slow speed options on the remote should help Overall it is a good truck.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonCustomer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty Cool Little Lowboy
customer_reviews.text: Although it's not necessarily a hobby grade item I think it's pretty cool. It looks cool and the various functions are cool. I added some detail to the tractor that, I think, make it cooler. The only drawback I see is the translation from Chinese to English on the instruction sheet. It's not easy to understand. I'm going to store my Double E excavator on it and I think that will be pretty cool. Let's see, can I use the word cool or cooler anymore? LOL
customer_reviews.author: M Squared

customer_reviews.title: Very cool.
customer_reviews.text: Overall, it's a fantastic toy. All functions are as-advertised. I also got a tractor and a dump truck. I have three issues with this, though... which also apply to the other toys from this company: 1. There is a noticeable delay in radio transmissions, so the truck doesn't respond right away to commands. 2. There are no limit switches, so you end up grinding gears on servos A LOT. I figured those will wear out very soon, at which point I'll just place some limit switches and replace gears with metal ones. 3. Battery dies incredibly quickly. I'll probably be replacing this in the near-future.
customer_reviews.author: B.K.

customer_reviews.title: You will also be impressed
customer_reviews.text: If you are looking for a RC tractor-trailer, I dont think you can find a better one for close to this price. From the wheels to the windows, this thing is well made. Can carry a full trailer of your other RC toys, over a variety of terrain. I would recommend this, and any other Double E Rc equipment. Features include: Functional 5th wheel hitch Ramps up/down Trailer jacks up/down High / Low speed Horn / Sound Off Led Headlights / Brakes/ Turn signals
customer_reviews.author: river

customer_reviews.title: Great Fun for Kids!
customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas present for my son(7yrs). He loves it!. The trailer connects and disconnects beautifully. the power and speed is great for beginners to advance. We added a small pack of bungy cords for "tie downs" and he loads and straps everything down. The power trailer adds to the experience nicely. I would recommend it to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: Brooke Benson

customer_reviews.title: Not 4 wheel drive as advertised
customer_reviews.text: First of all, the truck is not 4x4 or 4 wheel drive. I don't know if that was poorly translated from Chinese, just like the instructions that are almost comical to read but it's false advertising! Only the 2 rear wheels drive and the 2 front wheels steer. Nor very powerful for something that's meant to tow things as it gets pretty bogged down on short pile carpeting with just the trailer attached and not loaded. My 4 year olds loves it so I'm not sure if I'm returning it due to the fact I was expecting a truck with 4 wheel drive.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy T

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money!!!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly surprised at how well this tow truck is made and handles. Love the hydraulics, the turning compacity, the ability with a car on it, it can go from carpet to the lip of hardwood and drive over like nothing on it! My son loves the head lights, break lights, blinkers, and even the real life noises! Both of my sons grandpas were truckers so the authentic sounds and workings were important to us! Well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: Willow C

customer_reviews.title: This thing is great.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two for our grandsons 7 and 8 years old. Grandpa wanted to make sure they worked before we wrapped them. Well had to take them away from him. The trailer detached, lights, sound and remotes are great. The dump or front end loaded will load on these. The weather is great and we got crushed corn. Afraid sand would get unto moving parts. They big and little boys had a ball.
customer_reviews.author: ABjones

customer_reviews.title: DONE! FENETTO!
customer_reviews.text: A.z. won't let mo post a honest review! I have had enough b.s. from A.z.
customer_reviews.author: Scott W.

customer_reviews.title: Super awesome most realistic RC toy truck under $100
customer_reviews.text: Super amazing truck! Love the fact that trailer can be connected and disconnected via remote, makes it a lot more realistic. Love the sound effect and the lights. Wish the headlights stayed on longer instead of turning off every time you depress forward joystick. Love automatic trailer ramps and love the ability to sound horn from remote. I have to say if you use Bruder toy trucks, this one is smaller size. I was under assumption that it was same size, my fault I know but worth mensioning.
customer_reviews.author: Roman

customer_reviews.title: exceptional
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 6 yr old grandson. He was so excited he was jumping up and down and grandma received lots of hugs. The battery life was great. He played for over an hour with no problems. The toy is very sturdy. I would recommend to anyone. Excellent customer service also.
customer_reviews.author: HERE AGAIN

customer_reviews.title: Great truck stopped working...company replacing truck.
customer_reviews.text: What an amazing truck...my son is obsessed with it. However, the remote and/or cab stopped working (can’t tell if it was both parts or cab all along) and so we thought there was an issue with the remote. The company sent us a brand new remote, but the issue persisted. We’re now awaiting a new truck from the company, and are incredibly pleased with their responsiveness and how they stand behind their product. We will update when the new product comes.
customer_reviews.author: hkauf25

customer_reviews.title: 7 year old grandson loves this thing!
customer_reviews.text: 7 year old grandson loves this thing! He drives his other RC cars onto it and then uses the truck RC to zip around loaded with his other cars! Plus the rechargeable battery pack is so refreshing! No need to keep buying batteries!
customer_reviews.author: Amakimi

customer_reviews.title: Great RC  truck
customer_reviews.text: Great RC truck for all ages, it fast without the trailers, and with the trailers it so fun loading stuff on it. If you are thinking about if you should buy it or not? Definitely get it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kenny

customer_reviews.title: This is a great gift
customer_reviews.text: I was preparing to learn to drive a truck, and then I bought this remote control truck and learned how to reverse it. Of course, it can be used as a toy for children, simulating the sound of real trucks, horns, and gas. Very realistic, you can learn and use it as a gift
customer_reviews.author: Xinchen

customer_reviews.title: Keep on trucking.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his truck, he said he wanted it to teach our 12yr old how to drive, but really he just wants to drive it. Yes he is a big kid.
customer_reviews.author: Vero

customer_reviews.title: This truck does not disappoint!
customer_reviews.text: This truck has been great! Our 11 year old son was looking for months for a truck of a larger size, and this fit the bill. Not only does it carry other trucks, it has a working horn, the trailer detaches, and so far, the batteries do seem to last the time frame stated in the produce details. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: coffeeis4thebirds

customer_reviews.title: its all good
customer_reviews.text: its great everything is easy find on controller . i put a job box hung up on front of trailer for all wheel chocks . i made a chain rack and hold down tension draw down bars hung in a rack on back of the cab . i can tie down and haul anything . i also put sand in the trailer bed . stoped wheel spin when loading machinery . nothing but pure fun , thank you for a great hobbie when pined in the house . stay well keep your space an we can kick this carp !!
customer_reviews.author: tom w.

customer_reviews.title: Great truck - my 7yo loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 7yo son LOVES this truck. Seems durable and reliable. I find myself stealing the controller away and playing with it myself!
customer_reviews.author: CO Rob

customer_reviews.title: Great Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this truck for my son and he absolutely loves it! He spends hours playing with it at a time! It is made of good quality materials and is sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: blair

customer_reviews.title: Great gift
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift for our grandson. Before I wrapped it I charged the battery and ran it to be sure it was working properly. He is really going to enjoy playing with this.
customer_reviews.author: James Kieffer

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy
customer_reviews.text: My child got this for gos birthday. He's in love with it but the battery takes hours to charge
customer_reviews.author: Smith623

customer_reviews.title: Great quality..
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, get an extra battery or two because your kids are going to play non stop with this truck!
customer_reviews.author: Krystal Welch

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for 8 year old!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an A+ toy, great Grandson loves it! Battery has good life to it, would buy again and recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Laverne Davis

customer_reviews.title: Great service!
customer_reviews.text: I love this truck but even more I love their service. Within 2 days after Christmas I had a new one to replace a defective trailer pin. Now almost a year later they replaced my defective remote with no hassle. That's what I call service! Plus, it's a great toy for me and my son!
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Great detailed truck
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson but my husband loves it also. Has alit of features and functions. Would buy again
customer_reviews.author: A. Kent

customer_reviews.title: Best tow truck
customer_reviews.text: My 10 year old grandson received this for Christmas and loved it. Easy to get batteries in and get charged and was using it before you knew it. The dump truck and excavator, both fit nicely on the back.
customer_reviews.author: Peggy Kinker

customer_reviews.title: Great boy gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son and he absolutely loves unloading and reloading things to his truck. He takes this all around the house and shows it off to everyone he knows
customer_reviews.author: Carmen

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy!
customer_reviews.text: Our son loves this truck! He's fascinated by big trucks and having this one is a joy. He's 2 years old. We're happy with our purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Rafael E. Caicedo

customer_reviews.title: Awesome vehicle, a must have.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great rc vehicle. It has a long battery life.... the trailer has its own battery which lasts even longer. It is fully automated hands free operation. Great value and good quality for the price. I definitely recommend this truck.
customer_reviews.author: Kcsmith

customer_reviews.title: Great Product!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for a birthday present for my five year old cousin and he absolutely loves it! More than I expected from a remote control car! Very happy with it!
customer_reviews.author: Haley Talmage

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Both my son and my husband love playing with this remote control truck & trailer! It has showed its durability after hours of being played with by a toddler. I like that you can detach the trailer and control just the truck. Definitely recommend this rc truck. Great buy!!!
customer_reviews.author: david

customer_reviews.title: Family time
customer_reviews.text: Husband and son enjoy this and the other remote control construction vehicles we bought together. Long battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Tara

customer_reviews.title: too loud
customer_reviews.text: when you turn on the truck the sound of the toy is too loudly, and you are not able to turn off the sound or control the volume . not recommend play in the room, outside will be ok. also, the one we have need to pair remote and the truck every time you restart.
customer_reviews.author: ray88

customer_reviews.title: Fun truck
customer_reviews.text: Got it for my 5 yo, and my 10 yo and I are jealous. It really cool and very sturdy. We are looking at other RC’s made by this company to build a fleet. Only problem I have with it is I wish you could shut off the engine sound( and maybe you can, but I haven’t been able to or find it in the directions).
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful product for a good price
customer_reviews.text: I thought this product as part of a set of double E construction trucks. It was a get for my husband and he was not disappointed. Is sucks provide hours of play and express of imagination. They are very durable function like the real thing
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Miranda

customer_reviews.title: A bit pricey but delivers
customer_reviews.text: Very impressive! Sounds and lights and motion! Big hit, pricey but fun Christmas gift
customer_reviews.author: Megan

customer_reviews.title: This is a great toy
customer_reviews.text: This truck was a huge hit for my 6 year old grandson. Works perfectly. Lots of power too.
customer_reviews.author: Schlen2000

customer_reviews.title: Great durable toy for kids and adults!
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our six year old as a gift. He LOVES It. It is easy to use and he loves that the cab can detach and he can use that on its own. It’s is super durable and the remote control is easy enough for him to handle. I will probably buy another one for Christmas for his cousins we love it so much
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Double E RC Big Rig
customer_reviews.text: My 4 yo grandson was delighted with his big rig he received for Christmas. He and his grandfather have a great time with it and he loves playing with the remote control. Very pleased with this truck. We have requested extra batteries so he doesn’t have to wait for recharging as he loves playing with it
customer_reviews.author: SANDRA BOUFFARD

customer_reviews.title: Great RC truck!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered this for my grandson, he loves it! He is always showing my what it can do. He uses his other RC cars with it. Drives them on the trailer. He is able to maneuver it into small spaces. Perfect gift for a 8 yr old boy
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Fuller

customer_reviews.title: A little boy's request.
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what my grandson said he wanted. It won't be opened until Christmas, so I really can't review it now. Ask me again on Dec. 26.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: 7 year old son loves this
customer_reviews.text: We bought this for our 7 year old for Christmas and he absolutely loves it!! He loves to cruise around the house with it and load up his excavators and other toys on the trailer. It's really neat how the trailer can be hooked up and unhooked by the remote!! Great product!!!
customer_reviews.author: Matt Husman

customer_reviews.title: Cool toy to purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I enjoyed playing with the truck. It was so cool because the flatbed trailer was also fully remote control and it was easy to maneuver. It was a good buy!
customer_reviews.author: ravin g.

customer_reviews.title: Toy is fun
customer_reviews.text: The toy is fun to play with, the controls are good and it's a blast to play with my son. The battery has lasted very well too, Overall I like it a lot.
customer_reviews.author: Zory

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: Our son received this as a Christmas gift and has been playing with it non-stop ever since. He is five and had no trouble instantly driving the truck and trailer around the house to pick up all of his other trucks. He loves the electronic trailer lift gate and that the trailer can hook and unhook. He is a very happy guy!
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Fun but batteries don't last.
customer_reviews.text: Loved the functions on the remote, and the fact my son and i had fun with it. Hated that the batteries where good for 4 charges, then they wouldn't charge anymore. Going to try to get a new battery from the company but other than that I guess it's ok.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic tow truck toy
customer_reviews.text: Tow truck has amazing features and easy to control. My 7 yo absolutely loved this for his birthday. He had been begging me for a trailer for his r/c cars and this one was perfect. You can operate the tractor separate from the trailer.
customer_reviews.author: Beckandcharlie

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!!
customer_reviews.text: Size was way bigger than expected. Love how realistic it is. My husband wants his own now!!
customer_reviews.author: Mary Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Needs stronger drive motor.
customer_reviews.text: Fully functional to the point of being able to connect and disconnect the trailer from the remote. Would be nice to be able to mute the truck engine noise. Major complaint is the motor is very underpowered and had a hard time on normal carpet. If you put any of the 1:14 scale excavators/ crane on the trailer it won't move. Needs lower gearing or stronger motor.
customer_reviews.author: Z. Sprute

customer_reviews.title: does not work inside the house
customer_reviews.text: bough it for my grandson and it does not work inside the house i had to go out side that way he could play with it. didn't return it because my grandson like it. tyhat why i gave it 2 stars
customer_reviews.author: Elvis O.

customer_reviews.title: Landing gear
customer_reviews.text: The trailer retractable landing gear; the king pin; the bob tail, and total automation of it all has been what I have been looking for. I have spent quite some money looking for this, and ended up with components I have no time to assemble. This here comes assembled, and ready to roll. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Is really fun to play with.
customer_reviews.text: Satisfied with the purchase, good prices.but wishes they made it a 4wd instead.
customer_reviews.author: Auto body man

customer_reviews.title: Amazing experience
customer_reviews.text: The high power engine and the details oriented of the mini Mercedez-Benz have been making my free times funny. Realism of the truck, very happy with well done all details.
customer_reviews.author: Ivan

customer_reviews.title: Our son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I'm pretty impressed with this RC truck/trailer. If you're on carpet, expect the batteries to drain quicker than tile or something without carpet. But it's a pretty awesome remote control. Our son loves it. He always looks forward to playing with it, and we look forward to adding more construction site remotes to go along with it.
customer_reviews.author: James Summers

customer_reviews.title: Great truck for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Got this for our six year-old. Works great and has a lower speed setting on the controller that makes it more manageable around the house. Be sure to push the bind 1 and bind 2 buttons when you turn on the truck and trailer. Works great for hauling other RC construction equipment.
customer_reviews.author: Matt M.

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy for kids! The remote and directions are a little confusing.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew S.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: We LOVED this truck. Well built, fast, and the best remote controlled vehicle we’ve ever purchased. We bought this for our 4 year old who is obsessed with construction machines and he easily figured out the binding and unhitching of the trailer via remote. Great toy!
customer_reviews.author: K Dunnege

customer_reviews.title: Best tow truck
customer_reviews.text: Great rc truck I like that the trailer works just like a real one

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift great quality

customer_reviews.title: Great truck!
customer_reviews.text: This truck was perfect for our 5 yr old who was obsessed with trucks and trailers. The remote was easy for him to learn. He puts anything he can on the truck and can’t wait to get more like this!
customer_reviews.author: Joe Fugitt

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: This truck is very functional and fun. Batteries last a pretty good duration. Not exactly cheap but if you have ever bought a $30 RC Semi, this thing is well worth the money!
customer_reviews.author: D.W.

customer_reviews.title: Make sure to have batteries when you get it.
customer_reviews.text: This was an all around good gift. My boys are 5&7 and both really enjoy it. They have used it outside and inside the house and has been durable.

customer_reviews.title: 100%+ if the battery is good
customer_reviews.text: I love it. But the only issue so far the battery goes down very quickly. Even if you use it for 5 minutes in full charge. And you turn it off and after few hours you will have to charge it again

customer_reviews.title: Most enjoyed

customer_reviews.title: Nice truck, little tough to get the hang of driving, too loud.

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: My son just got this truck yesterday and absolutely loves it. It seems to hold up well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Mercedes-Benz Licensed RC Tow Truck Detachable Flatbed Semi Trailer Engineering Tractor Remote Control Trailer Truck Electronics Hobby Toy with Sound and Lights
feature_bullets: Flexible Tractor Switch-- High simulation trailer split joint. long press on the tractor switch button to connect and disconnect the trailer body and front tractor.firm trailer board can load and drag other construction vehicles like excavator, forklift, bulldozer,dump truck.

Mercedes-Benz Acros Authorized-- 1:20 full scale,Officially Authorized by Mercedes-Benz Acros. High Simulation Car Model,Toys Vehicle.playing with other construction vehicle as RC Excavator,shovel loader, RC dumper, lifting crane etc. would be more fun

Skew Plate Up & Down-- Pressing the landing key to control the up and down of the skew plate.other engineering tractor drive to long trailer board with the skew plate fall to the ground.lifting the the skew plate when not use

2.4G Remote Control Tey-- Remote control distance range up to 98ft.strong Anti-Jamming Capacity Support Multi RC Cars Playing Simultaneously. Extra 2*1.5V AA Battery for the Remote Control (Not Included)chnolog
